title: I still haven't got my Piltover nor Rakan+Xayah Icon yet
body:
When I am going to get those I fulfilled the requirements:

Went to the page for Piltover and clicked on the redeem thing like 5 months ago and I gifted a friend Xayah

replies.body:
It looks like you were able to gift Rakan and Xayah during the event times, but for some reason that icon never made it onto your account. The icons were supposed to be going out until the 10th, but I've gone ahead and added it to your account and you should be able to see it now. 

As for the Piltover icon, that event ended 2/2/2017 so I'm not sure there's much we'll be able to do about that one since it's been so long since the event ended. In the future, if these kinds of free icons don't seem to be coming onto your account, please hit us up as soon as possible so that we can take care of it.

I was really depressed about that time because my mom was hospitalized for an unknown disease (it ended being unknown since they just released her after 2 weeks of hospitalization without anything working... after she was released my mom told me she feared it was cancer). Also because I tried to redeem my project augment cache boxes but it didn't work... and riot support just told me they will never be able to work again (even tho when I purchased them it never said anywhere there was an expiration date for the boxes)... so I was just depressed and defeated... 

Sorry for the wall of text

Wow I feel you there bro, my mother actually had breast cancer and thankfully survived. I'm glad to hear she was released and it sounds like all is well now!

The project cache chests will indeed no longer work, and should have actually been removed when the event ended. Our [**event page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/store-update/access-granted/project-disruption-cache) mentioned that they would "self-destruct" on Aug 16th 2016. If you've still got those chests in your inventory, please write us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can take care of that.

> Secure your PROJECT: DISRUPTION Cache before it self-destructs on August 16 at 23:59 PT.

I am not talking about "PROJECT: DISRUPTION Cache", but the "AUGMENT CACHE" you could buy with RP. I checked and double checked and it didn't mention anywhere about being unable to work after the event ended.

In the Ticket I also argued this and I was told I was right that they never mentioned specifically and clearly about not being able to open them, but they refused to let me open them.

All of those event chests, while different types of items, were all lumped into the same category of being *event items*. The page may not have explicitly stated the name of each individual item, all of those event items were not meant to work once the event was over.

The huge difference was that they listed every other item. EVERY SINGLE OTHER ITEM said it was going to expire, the only one they didn't mention was "AUGMENT CACHE" and hence why I didn't use them. 

I know perfectly now what you guys meant but at the time it wasn't clear enough that "AUGMENT CACHE" were going to expire. The page actually listed "crafting materials" as items that would expire so it was perfectly clear that the cores and blueprints that you could "craft" from were going to expire. I looked again over and over in all your announcements and you made perfectly clear to list every item BUT the "AUGMENT CACHE" so I want to know how was I supposed to know I wouldn't be able to use them after the event?

I also want to add that every item had a "this item will expire by xx date" every item but the "AUGMENT CACHE" boxes
I never got the gifting Rakan/Xayah one either. :/
Hey broporo I never got the icon for gifting rakan. Can you help with that?
i gifted xayah, is that enough for the icon? if so i did not receive it.
i gifted both champs. and played the two games haven't received either of the icons.
I gifted Rakan to one of my friends and he gifted me Xayah. Still no icon...
